name: Sorcerer
details: You coax the magic power in your blood to manifest, accessing magic others don't expect you to have.

pf2t.name: Sorcerer
pf2t.body: You coax the magic power in your blood to manifest, accessing magic others don't expect you to have.

name: Sorcerer Dedication
details: Choose a bloodline. You become trained in the bloodline's two skills; for each of these skills in which you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice.

You cast spells like a sorcerer. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the spell list associated with your bloodline, or any other cantrips you learn or discover. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for your tradition's spells. Your key spellcasting ability for sorcerer archetype spells is Charisma, and they are sorcerer spells of your bloodline's tradition. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of bloodline.
special: You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the sorcerer archetype.

pf2t.name: Sorcerer Dedication
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Sorcerer
**Prerequisites** Charisma 14

- - -

Choose a bloodline. You become trained in the bloodline's two skills; for each of these skills in which you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice.

You cast spells like a sorcerer. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the spell list associated with your bloodline, from the spells granted by your bloodline, or any other cantrips of that tradition you learn or discover. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for your tradition's spells. Your key spellcasting ability for sorcerer archetype spells is Charisma, and they are sorcerer spells of your bloodline's tradition. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of bloodline.

#### Sorcerer Dedication Leads To...
Basic Blood Potency, Basic Bloodline Spell, Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting

name: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting
details: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits (page 219). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the sorcerer archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire: a common spell of your bloodline's tradition, one of your bloodline's granted spells, or another spell you have learned or discovered.

pf2t.name: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Sorcerer
**Prerequisites** Sorcerer Dedication

- - -

You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the sorcerer archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire: a common spell of your bloodline's tradition, one of your bloodline's granted spells, or another spell you have learned or discovered.

#### Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting Leads To...
Bloodline Breadth, Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting

name: Basic Blood Potency
details: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level sorcerer feat.

pf2t.name: Basic Blood Potency
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Sorcerer
**Prerequisites** Sorcerer Dedication

- - -

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level sorcerer feat.

#### Basic Blood Potency Leads To...
Advanced Blood Potency

name: Basic Bloodline Spell
details: You gain your bloodline's initial bloodline spell. If you don't already have one, you also gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus without any special effort. (For more on bloodline spells, see page 194.).

pf2t.name: Basic Bloodline Spell
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Sorcerer
**Prerequisites** Sorcerer Dedication

- - -

You gain your bloodline's initial bloodline spell. If you don't already have one, you also gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus without any special effort.

name: Advanced Blood Potency
details: You gain one sorcerer feat. For the purpose of prerequisites, your sorcerer level is half your character level.
special: You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you gain another sorcerer feat.

pf2t.name: Advanced Blood Potency
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Sorcerer
**Prerequisites** Basic Blood Potency

- - -

You gain one sorcerer feat. For the purpose of prerequisites, your sorcerer level is half your character level.

name: Bloodline Breadth
details: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more spells of your bloodline's tradition each day. Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and number of spell slots you gain from sorcerer archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

pf2t.name: Bloodline Breadth
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Sorcerer
**Prerequisites** Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting

- - -

Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more spells of your bloodline's tradition each day. Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and number of spell slots you gain from sorcerer archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest sorcerer spell slots.

name: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting
prerequisites: master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
details: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits (page 219).

pf2t.name: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Sorcerer
**Prerequisites** Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting; master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline

- - -

You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

#### Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting Leads To...
Master Sorcerer Spellcasting

name: Master Sorcerer Spellcasting
prerequisites: legendary in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
details: You gain the master spellcasting benefits (page 219).

pf2t.name: Master Sorcerer Spellcasting
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Sorcerer
**Prerequisites** Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline

- - -

You gain the master spellcasting benefits.
